meanings.definition: One who takes part in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: The participator joined the game with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent2: The participator in the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent3: The participator at the party danced like nobody was watching.
meanings.sent4: She was a participator in the journey of self-discovery.
meanings.sent5: The participator's presence lit up the room.
